description: This file contains API interaction functions related to user authentication, health checks, and user creation within the agno project. It defines functions for pinging the user API, authenticating users, signing in, checking authentication status, and creating anonymous users, utilizing external API endpoints and schemas.

methods.name: user_ping
methods.description: Checks the health status of the user API endpoint by sending a GET request and verifying the response.

methods.name: authenticate_and_get_user
methods.description: Authenticates a user with a provided token and optional existing user data, returning a UserSchema if successful.

methods.name: sign_in_user
methods.description: Signs in a user using email and password schema, saving the auth token if successful.

methods.name: user_is_authenticated
methods.description: Checks if the current user is authenticated by sending a request to the API and evaluating the response.

methods.name: create_anon_user
methods.description: Creates an anonymous user account via API and saves the auth token.
